testcase.classname: As a registered user (student/parent), I want to have access to the login page from the homepage
testcase.name: The "userlogin" page should contain a "forget password" link, and when clicked, it should redirect to the "ufpassword" page.
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "url" address....................................passed When The user clicks on the Login button....................................passed Then The user verifies that Login button redirects to the userlogin page....passed And The user clicks on forget password link.................................passed Then The user verifies that the forget password link redirects to the ufpassword page..passed
